## ReactNode type

A stand-in for the real React.ReactNode. Boolean values are ignored and not rendered. null and undefined are ignored and not rendered. ReactElement, number, and string are displayed directly. An array of ReactNodes will display all members of that array.

Use React.createElement to make the ReactElement type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ReactNode = ReactElement | string | number | null | undefined | boolean | ReactNode[];
```
**References:** [ReactElement](./bitburner.reactelement.md)<!-- -->, [ReactNode](./bitburner.reactnode.md)
